body.p: You can create a variety of publications or versions of your documentation from a single map by applying profiling conditions to the build.

includes preconfigured transformation scenarios for DITA. By default, these scenarios take the current profiling condition set into account during the transformation, as defined in the Filters tab when creating a DITA transformation. You can also specify a DITAVAL file that defines filters for your profiled content.

fig.title: Profiling Option in the Filters Tab (DITA OT Transformations)
